is_iso_of_mono_of_epi:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⟶ » -/
/-
Copyright (c) 2022 Markus Himmel. All rights reserved.
Released under Apache 2.0 license as described in the file LICENSE.
Authors: Markus Himmel
-/
theorem is_iso_of_mono_of_epi [balanced C] {X Y : C} (f : «expr ⟶ » X Y) [Mono f] [Epi f] : IsIso f :=
  balanced.is_iso_of_mono_of_epi _
#align is_iso_of_mono_of_epi is_iso_of_mono_of_epi
is_iso_iff_mono_and_epi:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⟶ » -/
theorem is_iso_iff_mono_and_epi [balanced C] {X Y : C} (f : «expr ⟶ » X Y) : IsIso f ↔ Mono f ∧ Epi f :=
  ⟨fun _ => ⟨infer_instance, infer_instance⟩, fun ⟨_, _⟩ => is_iso_of_mono_of_epi _⟩
#align is_iso_iff_mono_and_epi is_iso_iff_mono_and_epi
balanced_opposite:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ᵒᵖ» -/
theorem balanced_opposite [balanced C] : balanced («expr ᵒᵖ» C) :=
  {
    is_iso_of_mono_of_epi := fun X Y f fmono fepi =>
      by
      rw [← quiver.hom.op_unop f]
      exact is_iso_of_op _ }
#align balanced_opposite balanced_opposite
